column4: just wondering if anyone knew why i cant get my desktop resolution to 1600x1200 using nvdia geforce mx 400
You're sure your monitor supports that ?
you should get gutsy (or hold out a little and go right to hardy) .. dapper is pretty old and getting nvidia cards going wasn't as easy as it is in later versions
but since you're here.. pop a terminal and type "sudo apt-get install nvidia-glx-legacy" I think..
